column6: anything else I should say? Oh
column7: yea their sausage (black pepper and garlic) is ridiculously good
column8: I've been here several times and brisket
column10: brisket......and the sides are no slouch either

column17: since I have just returned to Texas and me being a native makes me remember how great the BBQ is
column18: keep up the good work and please stay consistent.
